name: src/core/action.js
createAction
description:
Creates an observable function that
asynchronously invokes the nested inner function.

The inner function may call `emit`.

name: src/core/observable/base.js
Observable

throws.description: if `listener` is already subscribed to this observable

name: hasSubscribed
description: True if `listener` has subscribed to `this` observable

name: emit
description:
Invoke each registered listener with `value`.

**Note**: method returns immediately,
but listeners will be called synchronously in subscription order

params.name: value
params.description: argument will be passed to listeners

name: map

params.name: mapper
params.description: how to transform the emitted value

name: filter
reduce
src/core/observable/index.js
src/core/observable/state.js
ObservableState
getState
description: Return current state or asynchronously invoke callback
examples:
<caption>Without arguments - synchronous</caption>
let name = new ObservableState("Guest");
let val = name.getState();
assert(val === "Guest");

<caption>With callback - asynchronous</caption>
let name = new ObservableState("Guest");
let returnVal = name.getState(val => {
  assert(val === "Guest")
});
assert(returnVal === undefined);

name: emit
description:
Same as {@link Observable#emit}, but sets
current state to `value`

name: src/core/observable/subscription.js
Subscription
src/core/store.js
Store

throws.description: when trying to instantiate the abstract {@link Store} directly

name: createStore
description:
Dynamically extends {@link Store} and instantiates the new class. `options.getInitialState` and either `options.reducer` or `options.reducers` are required.
When both are defined, `options.reducers` takes precedence.
Type requirements are interchangable, meaning either can take {@link Object} or {@link function}.

name: src/core/subscriber.js
createSubscriber
description:
Higher-order component that automatically subscribes to
{@link ObservableState} props.

name: src/index.js
Message
src/utils/index.js
isObservableState
description: True if {@link isObservable}(`value`) and `value.getState` is a method
